Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the scorpion NDBP 5 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28657596] Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50μg/mL);Gram-negative bacterium:S. typhimurium (MIC=100μg/mL), Escherichia coli (MIC=50μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28657596] 2% hemolysis at 10 μg/ml, 96% hemolysis at 50 μg/ml against human red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Residue 6 is important for antibacterial activity, and hemolysis activity
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity and Toxicity of Analogs of Scorpion Venom IsCT Peptides
Literature.Author: de la Salud Bea R, Petraglia AF, Ascuitto MR, Buck QM.
